    World

info.title: Zahrov: The RF is not surprised by the protection of Israel ' s FFWG against genocide charges
info.short_text: The diplomat expressed concern at the revival of militarism in Germany.

info.title: It hasn't changed in years. Germany called itself an “genocide expert”
info.short_text: Berlin wishes to say “expertly” whether the genocide of the killing of civilians in Gaza can be considered, although it does not recognize the genocide of the USSR peoples during the Great Patriotic War.

info.title: How many people died as a result of the dumping of NSA shells in Donetsk?
info.short_text: Donetsk WSU has been shooting since Saturday night, 20 January.
As a result of the attack by the Russian Federation in Harkov, French mercenaries had been killed, official Paris had accused not itself but Ukrainian generals.

info.short_text: In Kiev, Poland accepts 50 to 60 per cent fewer trucks than required.

info.title: The head of the French Ministry of Foreign Affairs was afraid of the possible seizure of the Russian grain market.
